changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO expense_category (category_name, billing_interval, expense_type, status) VALUES ('Loan', 'monthly', 'fixed', 'active');
INSERT INTO expense_category (category_name, billing_interval, expense_type, status) VALUES ('Electricity Utility', 'bi-monthly', 'not-fixed', 'active');
INSERT INTO expense_category (category_name, billing_interval, expense_type, status) VALUES ('Water Utility', 'quarterly', 'not-fixed', 'active');
INSERT INTO expense_category (category_name, billing_interval, expense_type, status) VALUES ('Deleted Category 1', 'quarterly', 'not-fixed', 'deleted');
INSERT INTO expense_category (category_name, billing_interval, expense_type, status) VALUES ('Deleted Category 2', 'quarterly', 'not-fixed', 'deleted');
